      public boolean canAfford(HashMap<Object,Integer> cost)
      Method to check whether this Player can afford something based on its cost
      Parameters:
      cost - the cost of the item, the key should be an Integer for sestertii and the value should be the value of either the sestertii or the good in the Map
      Returns:
      whether this Player can afford something based on its cost
